original_text: The lion killed to give enough food to his young lions and he strangled animals to feed his female lion. He filled his home with the animals that he had killed.
korean_text: 수사자가 그 새끼를 위하여 먹이를 충분히 찢고 그의 암사자들을 위하여 움켜 사냥한 것으로 그 굴을 채웠고 찢은 것으로 그 구멍을 채웠었도다

sentences.original_text: The lion killed to give enough food
sentences.korean_translation: 사자는 충분한 음식을 주기 위해 사냥했습니다

sentences.original_text: with the animals that he had killed
